programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets) S1 (15/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets»Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Fundraiser Day / Paddington's Alien Adventure) S1 (18/33)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fundraiser Day / Paddington's Alien Adventure»The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof, and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money. // Will the strange radio messages Jonathan is receiving mean visitors are arriving from another world? Paddington forms a greeting committee!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Monsieur l'épouvantail) S2 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Monsieur l'épouvantail»Peppa and George go to the beach with Grandpa and Grandma Pig and find tide pools there. Peppa doesn't like it at first, but when she discovers what can be experienced with and in such pools and she even rescues a fish, she wants one too.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La capsule du temps) S2 (9/52)
programme.desc: «La capsule du temps»Madame Gazelle makes a time capsule with the class. As soon as it is buried, Peppa wants to dig it up again, but Madame Gazelle knows something better. They dig up their parents' capsule when they were little. And that is very funny!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le recyclage) S2 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le recyclage»Peppa et George aident Maman Pig à faire la vaisselle. Elle leur apprend alors à recycler les bouteilles ainsi que les journaux...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le bureau de papa Pig) S2 (22/52)
programme.desc: «Le bureau de papa Pig»Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig's office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit's job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat's job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig's job is... complicated. Peppa and George have a go at each job. They love working at Daddy's office.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (En route pour la savane !) S6 (n°28)
programme.desc: «En route pour la savane !»The Big Rig Bandit!: When reckless hyena Spotty steals young elephant Eli from the savanna, Wildlife Rangers Zooli and Goby hop into their big rig to rescue him! (S6, ep 16).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel) S3 (14/18)
programme.desc: «Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel»Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?"" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Bienvenue chez Josh et Blue !) S1 (1/17)
programme.desc: «Bienvenue chez Josh et Blue !»Something is missing from Blue's snack, so we play Blue's Clues with our new host, Josh, to find out what it is. With a little help from our old friends, Steve and Joe, Josh finds out what Blue wants with her snack.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Les bateaux ont été rétrécis / Le défilé des pirates) S1 (11/21)
programme.desc: «Les bateaux ont été rétrécis / Le défilé des pirates»When Escarlata turns the crew tiny, they have to find a pint-sized way to save the day. // It's time for the annual Pirate Parade! That is, unless Escarlata has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Chickcharney Island) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Chickcharney Island»Return to Merlandia: The crew return to Merlandia for an underwater fair, but must save the day when the power grid becomes overloaded. (S2, ep 8b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Toothpaste Tumble) S2 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Toothpaste Tumble»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Finship Trap) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «The Finship Trap»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le miel a disparu) S6 (4/26)
programme.desc: «Le miel a disparu»Pups Save the Honey: Farmer Yumi's Yummy Honey is all the buzz when it - and her beehive - go missing from her farm! (S6, ep 4a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Un train fou dans le désert / Le parcours d'escalarbre) S8 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Un train fou dans le désert / Le parcours d'escalarbre»When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers. // Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Bébé Alexandre) S3 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Bébé Alexandre»Les cousins de Peppa viennent en visite. Alexandre, un bébé, ne parle pas encore. Peppa lui enseigne son premier mot...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La maison de Rebecca Rabbit) S2 (39/52)
programme.desc: «La maison de Rebecca Rabbit»Peppa et George vont chez Rebecca Rabbit et découvrent que dans sa maison, les tunnels remplacent les couloirs et les escaliers. A l'heure du repas, George apprend que les lapins aiment les carottes...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une chaude journée) S1 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Une chaude journée»It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les crêpes) S1 (29/52)
programme.desc: «Les crêpes»Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La garderie à domicile) S1 (30/52)
programme.desc: «La garderie à domicile»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La leçon de danse) S1 (31/52)
programme.desc: «La leçon de danse»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Shooting Star) S1 (13/78)
programme.desc: «Shooting Star»Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Circus Celebration) S1 (14/78)
programme.desc: «Circus Celebration»Bubu's DVD of his favourite circus show does not work. So the others create their own circus acts in the backyard instead. (S1, ep 14).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue's Treasure of the Clue Lagoon) S3 (13/18)
programme.desc: «Blue's Treasure of the Clue Lagoon»Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le tresor du palais de glace / Au secours de Ryder) S8 (9/24)
programme.desc: «Le tresor du palais de glace / Au secours de Ryder»Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore. // The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save Heady Humdinger) S5 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Pups Save Heady Humdinger»Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Numéro de voltige de Lola / Le Monstre des égouts) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Le Numéro de voltige de Lola / Le Monstre des égouts»Lola is worried her air display will not be impressive enough, but when Sir Steel joins, the air display goes wrong in a spectacular way! // When Sir Steel's dog Muffin's ball goes missing down the sewers, Bobbi has to face his fear of the dark.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Panique au jardin public / Complètement givré) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Panique au jardin public / Complètement givré»Rammy's tips about focus and meditation come in handy when Mister Staal's Replicator makes donuts rain in Midden Bos. When Kai takes out his Hydropower on an ice cream machine, it turns into an unhinged ice bot!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons) S1 (26/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons»Jonathan has lost his balloon, Paddington tries to get him a new one but accidentally ends up flying all over London. How will he get down? Pigeonton get help! // After a neighborhood watch talk Paddington decides to go on patrol as an unofficial policeman. Soon he has to solve a real crime but who is the litterbug?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Brood) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Brood»

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les ours polaires / Un costume sur mesure) S3 (11/26)
programme.desc: «Les ours polaires / Un costume sur mesure»When little lambs keep running away from Farmer Al's pasture, it's up to the Paw Patrol to find the missing sheep.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le bus scolaire / Les mésanges charbonnières) S3 (12/26)
programme.desc: «Le bus scolaire / Les mésanges charbonnières»When all the tires on the Adventure Bay school bus blow out, Ryder volunteers to use the Paw Patroller as a substitute school bus.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Toothpaste Tumble) S2 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Toothpaste Tumble»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Shark House Rock) S2 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Shark House Rock»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le collier porte-bonheur / La surprise de Vigo) S2 (8/13)
programme.desc: «Le collier porte-bonheur / La surprise de Vigo»Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. // Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Chickcharney Island / The Lost Girl in a Canoe) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Chickcharney Island / The Lost Girl in a Canoe»With the help of their new friends, the Chickcharneys, Santi and crew must stop Pepito from stealing their treasured drum. // The crew meet a Chamorro girl with a broken canoe who has been magically transported to their ocean.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Time Capsule / Hiccup Soup) S2 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Time Capsule / Hiccup Soup»Santi and crew get magically transported to the past, where they team up with young Abuelo to get back to the present! // When faced with a case of magical hiccups, Santi and his crew must collect ingredients to make the cure-all Hiccup Soup.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'orage) S1 (32/52)
programme.desc: «L'orage»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les instruments de musique) S1 (16/52)
programme.desc: «Les instruments de musique»Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig find a box of instruments in the attic, and Peppa and George try them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le lavage de la voiture) S1 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le lavage de la voiture»Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le déjeuner) S1 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le déjeuner»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camping) S1 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Le camping»Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le hoquet) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le hoquet»George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fée dents de lait) S1 (22/52)
programme.desc: «La fée dents de lait»Peppa's tooth has come out, so she puts it under her pillow for the Tooth Fairy. But Peppa fears she might be malicious.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Ma cousine Chloé) S1 (28/52)
programme.desc: «Ma cousine Chloé»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés»Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Camion postier Blaze) S7 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Camion postier Blaze»When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Sparkle à la rescousse) S7 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Sparkle à la rescousse»When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La moustache de Monsieur Hellinger / La fête foraine) S8 (5/26)
programme.desc: «La moustache de Monsieur Hellinger / La fête foraine»The Pups must help to find Mayor Humdinger's mustache after he accidentally shaves it off before it's about to be on the cover of a magazine. // When a carnival train gets stuck in a tunnel, it results in a mountainside funhouse-style wild ride.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les éléphants apeurés / Le chanteur et les loups) S8 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Les éléphants apeurés / Le chanteur et les loups»A bee frightens some elephants in 'Pups Save The Hiding Elephants', then in 'Pups Save a Yodeler', Wingnut runs away from wolves and ends up trapped in a canyon. (S8, ep 7).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Toothpaste Tumble) S2 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Toothpaste Tumble»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.desc: «Une chaude journée»It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les marionnettes de Chloé) S1 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Les marionnettes de Chloé»Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa fait de l'exercice) S1 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Papa fait de l'exercice»Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Very Busy Afternoon) S1 (17/78)
programme.desc: «A Very Busy Afternoon»A Very Busy Afternoon: Froga organises a gathering to share jam sandwiches with everyone, Ron and Christopher want to show off their acrobatic frisbee skills, (S1, ep 17).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Four-Leaf Clover) S1 (18/78)
programme.desc: «The Four-Leaf Clover»The Four-Leaf Clover: Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her! Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win. (S1, ep 18).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une berceuse pour Blue) S2 (9/21)
programme.desc: «Une berceuse pour Blue»It's a nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite part of bedtime! As we search for clues, we help Blue and Polka Dots get clean, comfy, cozy and ready for bed.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Into the Blueniverse) S4 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Into the Blueniverse»Into the Blueniverse!: It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into the Blueniverse! Where has it gone? (S3, ep 17).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf) S9 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf»When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Fin de partie / Jeunesse éternelle) S2 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Fin de partie / Jeunesse éternelle»Kai invents a new Virtual Reality training game, but Stu and Safia enter the game and want to be the winners! // The Deer Squad must help the city's residents when they break out in spots thanks to Sir Steel's new face cream.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace) S2 (14/20)
programme.desc: «Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace»When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work) S2 (12/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work»Judy loses a tooth quite literally- Will it be found in time for bed and will the tooth fairy like marmalade? // Paddington becomes a work bear and helps Mr. Brown in the home office but learns computers can be tricky things.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Potato Stew) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Potato Stew»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La bonne vieille source / Le poney) S3 (13/26)
programme.desc: «La bonne vieille source / Le poney»Ryder and the pups need to unplug Old Trusty the geyser to stop water sprouting up all over town.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le robot-saure / Le festival de cinéma) S3 (14/26)
programme.desc: «Le robot-saure / Le festival de cinéma»The pups are shooting their Film Festival entry until Daring Danny X cuts the action with his dangerous stunt.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le camping en famille / La parade de bienvenue) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Le camping en famille / La parade de bienvenue»It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Comet Cupcakes / Tina's New Friend) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Comet Cupcakes / Tina's New Friend»The crew help Capt. Sprinkles find a flower to make his special cupcakes but when Escarlata steals it they must get it back.// While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (La légende du Capitaine Calavera) S1 (1/21)
programme.desc: «La légende du Capitaine Calavera»When Santiago discovers the lost treasure of the legendary Capitán Calavera, he and his friends become the new Pirate Protectors of Isla Encanto.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa accroche une photo) S1 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Papa accroche une photo»Papa Pig promises to put up a picture of Peppa and George when Mama Pig is gone. He accidentally damages the wall, so Peppa and George help Papa Pig fix the wall before Mama Pig gets home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Titine la tortue) S4 (6/52)
programme.desc: «Titine la tortue»Titine, la tortue du docteur Hamster, est coincée dans un arbre une fois de plus...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (A la plage) S1 (46/52)
programme.desc: «A la plage»Peppa and her family go to the beach. There they do all kinds of things, such as digging Papa Pig in the sand. When it's time to go home, they almost leave without Papa Big, because he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Madame Patte géante) S1 (47/52)
programme.desc: «Madame Patte géante»George finds a spider in the bathroom sink. Peppa is very scared until she realizes he doesn't want to harm her.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le bateau de papi) S1 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le bateau de papi»Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête de l'école) S1 (20/52)
programme.desc: «La fête de l'école»Peppa and her family go to the street fair at school and do all kinds of things there. Peppa and her friends have their face painted like tigers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de maman Pig) S1 (21/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de maman Pig»Peppa et George se demandent quoi offrir à leur maman à l'occasion de son anniversaire. Ils interrogent papa Cochon à ce sujet...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fée dents de lait) S1 (22/52)
programme.desc: «La fée dents de lait»Peppa's tooth has come out, so she puts it under her pillow for the Tooth Fairy. But Peppa fears she might be malicious.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le super lot géant) S4 (6/20)
programme.desc: «Le super lot géant»At the Axle City Fair, Blaze and AJ realize they don't have enough coins to use the new Supersize Prize Machine. So to earn money, Blaze gets three different jobs, transforming into super-cool vehicles to take care of business.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Ninja Blaze) S4 (11/20)
programme.desc: «Ninja Blaze»Ninja Master Blackbelt is training Blaze and AJ to be powerful ninjas when Crusher and Pickle accidentally launch themselves onto an icy mountain! Now Blaze and AJ must use their new ninjas skills to rescue them.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Alex, le louveteau / Surprise !) S2 (18/26)
programme.desc: «Alex, le louveteau / Surprise !»While camping, Marshall and the PAW Patrol help Alex learn about Fire Safety!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Maurice et Mauricette / L'os de dinosaure) S2 (21/26)
programme.desc: «Maurice et Mauricette / L'os de dinosaure»The PAW Patrol plan a special celebration for Wally the Walrus. When he doesn't show up, they find he has a special new friend named Walinda!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le collier porte-bonheur / La surprise de Vigo) S2 (8/13)
programme.desc: «Le collier porte-bonheur / La surprise de Vigo»Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. // Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.
